plot outline: Watch the full movie, Harakeya Kuri online, only on Eros Now. Harakeya Kuri is a 1992 Indian Kannada political drama film directed and produced by K. S. L. Swamy. Starring Vishnuvardhan, Prakash Rai and Geetha in lead roles, the film was based on the novel of the same name by Chandrashekhara Kambara.

Starring Vishnuvardhan, Prakash Rai and Geetha in lead roles, the film was based on the novel of the same name by Chandrashekhara Kambara.
